profileText: a Representative from Illinois; born in Peoria, Peoria County, Ill., March 11, 1977; B.A., University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, Ill., 1999; trade unionist; senior advisor, Governor of Illinois J. B. Pritzker, 2019-2020; chief of staff, United States Office of Management and Budget, 2021; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 2023-present).
